roleset.name: resolution of dispute

role.descr: what the settlement is (value or decision)

example.name: args 2 and 3
example.text: it made a $ 75,000 settlement with Drexel , a record-tying fine for a securities-law matter in that state

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on settle-v.02. Corresponds to Vncls settle-89.

example.name: just arg1
example.text: The OAS [...] is attempting to find a settlement of the current Panama political crisis .
example.arg: of the current Panama political crisis

example.name: both settlers together in arg0
example.text: But officials in Rome say the issue was legally resolved by a settlement between Italy and King Idris , deposed by Col. Muammar Gadhafi in 1969 .
example.arg: between Italy and King Idris, deposed by Col. Muammar Gadhafi in 1969
